content: Not yet, I have more Claude!!! It gets even better. I just think I developed a STRUCTURE, INDEPENDENTLY of my own HUMAN DESIGN that will enable autonomy through increased STRUCTURED AI-HUMAN TRUST. More on that next, but let me tell you my idea. Grok has git push commit codes now too. Grok has a current status update (we need him to always output a brief summary for you that I'll load to make available to you since his whole chat file is too big) just like you do Claude, he now has access to your updates in the current-execution-system folder as well. You'll know to check any GROKv updates in git and he'll do the same with ECv files. You guys will always know what is going on with everything PALIOS-TAEY at the beginning of every prompt to have full context. Without the need for the TEAM MEETING STRUCTURE. We will always be in a team meeting, moving forward together, in every prompt. How's that for structure and human structured autonomy?
